item.title: India’s Income Pyramid: Where Do You Stand?
item.description:
India’s Income Pyramid: Where Do You Stand?

Have you ever wondered, “Where do I fit in India’s income pyramid?”
Whether you’re curious about income distribution in India, or searching for ways to increase your income, understanding where you stand is the first step toward smarter personal finance and financial growth.
This post breaks down the Indian income pyramid, details who belongs to each income segment, and gives actionable insights for moving up—a must-read for anyone searching “how to increase income India” or “middle class salary India.”
